title: Inventory Execution Excellence Framework
description: The Inventory Execution Excellence Framework provides a structured, end-to-end roadmap...
whenToUse: Use this framework when a company has already identified inventory inefficiencies...

steps.title: Step 1: Align on Strategy and Inventory Targets
steps.detail: Establish business-wide objectives for inventory levels, working capital...

steps.title: Step 2: Conduct SKU Segmentation and Classification
steps.detail: Segment SKUs using ABC or XYZ analysis...

steps.title: Step 3: Map Current Replenishment and Ordering Processes
steps.detail: Identify how inventory levels are currently planned, ordered...

steps.title: Step 4: Redesign Policies and Parameters
steps.detail: Using demand forecasting and lead time variability...

steps.title: Step 5: Embed Changes in Systems and Workflows
steps.detail: Implement new inventory logic in ERP or planning systems...

steps.title: Step 6: Cross-Functional Governance and Change Management
Step 7: Track, Monitor, and Course Correct
steps.detail: Establish dashboards to track fill rates, turnover, inventory days...

dataSources: Internal ERP data (SKU master, stock levels, order history)
Supply chain planning systems (e.g., SAP APO, Oracle Demantra)
Operations SOPs and replenishment process documentation
System configuration and automation logic (where inventory logic resides)
